name: Clemon PERRY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Perry v. Court of Common Pleas

parties: Clemon PERRY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 28th day of July, 2010, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
2 A.3d 470
Clemon PERRY, Petitioner v. COURT OF COMMON PLEAS PHILADELPHIA, Respondent.
No. 47 EM 2010.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 28, 2010.
